name: Final Fantasy XI Adventure
description:
The "popular" MMO Final Fantasy XI, now for the Game Boy! Over 15 of your favorite areas, in stunning 2-bit graphics!

This is a demo ROM showcasing the areas and music. Actual gameplay to come.

This is an actual Game Boy ROM, and needs to be played in an emulator such as VisualBoy, or on real hardware with a flashcart!

Boxed copies of the demo available now, full game available when (or if) it's complete. Once the game is complete, contact me to arrange for me to update your cartridge with the full game for free.

Made with GB Studio
